addMoneySecondText: You added {{amount}} to your Impact Account.
addMoneySecondTextCompany: You added {{amount}} to the {{companyName}} Impact Account.
addMoneyDonationMatchedAutoText: In addition, {{matchedAmount}} was matched by {{donationCompany}}, for a total of {{totalAmount}} added to your Impact Account.
addMoneyDonationMatchedManualText: In addition, you requested a {{matchedAmount}} match from {{donationCompany}}. When their administrator accepts your request, any matched funds will also appear in your account.
addMoneyThirdText: You can give these charitable dollars to others, including charities and Giving Groups, whenever you choose.
addMoneyRecurringSecondText: You scheduled {{amount}} to be added to your Impact Account each month, starting on {{startsOn}}. Each time, a tax receipt will automatically be posted to your account.
addMoneyRecurringCompanySecondText: You scheduled {{amount}} to be added to the {{companyName}} Impact Account each month, starting on {{startsOn}}. Each time, a tax receipt will automatically be posted to company account.
addMoneyRecurringThirdText: Any match requests approved by {{donationCompany}} will also be added to your account according to their matching policy.
charityTimeForSending: Your gift will be sent to {{charityName}} on {{month}}.
charityTimeForSendingFromOther: Your gift from {{fromName}} will be sent to {{charityName}} on {{month}}.
charityRecurringThirdText: Because this gift will be coming from your Impact Account, please make sure there are enough funds in your account before each monthly processing date If you'd like, you can also set up a monthly deposit to make sure you always have enough money in your Impact Account to cover your monthly gifts.
fromToRecipient: Your gift of charitable dollars has been sent to {{name}}.
fromOtherToRecipient: Your gift of charitable dollars from {{fromName}} has been sent to {{name}}.
charityTimeForSendingRecurring: You scheduled {{amount}} to be sent to {{charityName}} each month, starting on {{month}}.
charityTimeForSendingRecurringFromOther: You scheduled {{amount}} from {{fromName}} to be sent to {{charityName}} each month, starting on {{month}}.
groupTimeForSending: Your gift has been sent to {{groupName}}
groupTimeForSendingFromOther: Your gift from {{fromName}} has been sent to {{groupName}}
groupTimeForSendingRecurring: You scheduled {{amount}} to be sent to {{groupName}} each month, starting on {{month}}.
groupTimeForSendingRecurringFromOther: You scheduled {{amount}} from {{fromName}} to be sent to {{groupName}} each month, starting on {{month}}.
groupMatchByText: In addition, {{matchedAmount}} was matched by {{matchedCompany}}, for a total of {{totalAmount}} sent to {{groupName}}.
groupMatchByRecurringText: Any matching funds available will also be added to your gift.
quaziDonationSuccessMessageTwo: We're processing your transaction and will add {{amount}} to your Impact Account shortly. We'll send you an email within 24 hours confirming that the amount has been added.
